entries.journal_entry_description: Majolnir is helping me steal a new speeder for myself.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Majolnir wants you to talk to Gendra. While you're conversing with him, try to pick his pocket.
entries.task01_message_box_text: Gendra had a half-chewed piece of meat jerkey, some crumpled sheet music, and a large piece of lint in his pocket. No deed for a vehicle though.
entries.task02_comm_message_text: Ok, we're going to the big guy here. The mayor himself, Mikdanyell Guh'rantt. He's bound to have one. Just get him talking and check his pockets.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The Mayor should have a deed for a speeder on him. Get him talking and pick his pocket.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Majolnir can show you how to use this deed you've just acquired.
